original_text:
They make their tongues as sharp as a serpent’s;
    the poison of vipers is on their lips.
korean_text: 뱀 같이 그 혀를 날카롭게 하니 그 입술 아래에는 독사의 독이 있나이다 (셀라)

sentences.original_text: They make their tongues as sharp as a serpent's
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 혀를 뱀의 혀처럼 날카롭게 만듭니다

sentences.original_text: the poison of vipers is on their lips
